title: Launcher Not Opening 7.2
body: Recently ive been opening league and it goes to the dark blue background but wont go past that. Fix Please

replies.body:
It sounds like your patcher is unable to properly establish a solid connection to our patching servers. This could be for a few different reasons, but our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) does a great job at targeting the most common solutions for these issues, so I recommend you give those steps a try.

Let me know if those steps weren't able to resolve your issues.
